00025 #ifndef _Ogre_ILUtil_H__
00026 #define _Ogre_ILUtil_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 #include "OgreCommon.h"
00030 #include "OgrePixelFormat.h"
00031 
00032 namespace Ogre {
00033 
00034     /* 
00035      * DevIL specific utility class
00036      **/    
00037     class _OgrePrivate ILUtil {
00038     public:
00040         struct ILFormat {
00042             ILFormat():
00043                 numberOfChannels(0), format(-1), type(-1) {};
00044 
00046             ILFormat(int channels, int format, int type=-1):
00047                 numberOfChannels(channels), format(format), type(type) {}
00048 
00050             bool isValid() { return format!=-1; }
00051 
00053             int numberOfChannels;
00055             int format;
00057             int type;
00058         };
00059 
00062         static PixelFormat ilFormat2OgreFormat( int ImageFormat, int ImageType );
00067         static ILFormat OgreFormat2ilFormat( PixelFormat format );      
00076         static void toOgre(const PixelBox &dst);
00077 
00082         static void fromOgre(const PixelBox &src);
00083     };
00084 
00085 }
